东南亚服冒险岛公告


v237 Known Issues and Fixed Issues (Updated 20 Nov, 1226hrs)


13 Nov 2024

v237 Known Issues and Fixed Issues (Updated 20 Nov, 1226hrs)




Dear Maplers,
Please refer to the update notice for information regarding each patch's issues and updates.

Last Update: 20th November 2024, 1226hrs

Thank you to Maplers who reported issue(s) listed below.

Known Issues
  • An issue where CHASER: FATE Von Leon's Swordsmanship Total Activation 100/200/300/400 check list cannot be progressed is being investigated.
  • An issue where CHASER: FATE Spirit Emotions 'Clear Spirit Emotions Normal/Hard' check list cannot be completed is being investigated.
  • An issue where some Maplers' CHASER: FATE's Arrest Warrant does not reset after Thursday midnight is being investigated.
  • An issue where Brillant glow, Rainbow Moonstone Jewel Totem quest cannot be found is being investigated.
  • An issue where chat box sentence(s) related to CHASER: FATE contains text error is being investigated.
  • An issue where certain monster(s) name contains inconsistency is being investigated.
  • An issue where frame rate fluctuation and input lag are present when playing Spirit Emotions is being investigated.
  • An issue where some Maplers are experiencing game client disconnection is being investigated.

    • Issues Scheduled to be Fixed

    Note: Issues scheduled to be fixed are subject to change.

    Resolved Issues
  • [Resolved] An issue where if the game client with external chat enabled is dragged from 1 monitor to another would cause the cursor to behave abnormally is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Easy Lucid in Maple Guide's Boss Content displaying 2 Green Jade Boss Ring Box (Basic) as obtainable rewards is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Damage Skin - Paper Ribbon (KR Unit), Damage Skin - Error Message and Damage Skin - Puss-In-Loots cannot be seen in Damage Skin UI is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Sword Celestial - Susanoo cannot be cancelled by pressing the skill again is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Mushroid obtained from Double Mush Pass is affected by Skill Effect Transparency is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Shadower's Pick Pocket/Bloody Pocket does not drop coins when defeating monsters in Guild Castle: Cache of Greed is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Crystal with Strong Power (Daily), Crystal with Strong Power (Weekly) and Crystal with Strong Power (Monthly) tooltip contains text error is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where the complete all Daily Quests function could not be completed from the Maple Scheduler system is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where [V Matrix] Gemstomes are Heavier than Mesos! achievement contains text error is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where a dialogue in Azwan Sibyl's Blessing's Grandis Daily Mission Reward contains text error is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Azwan Sibyl's Blessing's Mysterious Energy: Bounty Hunter/Flame Wolf Additional EXP persist after exits Polo/Frito/Flame Wolf portal is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where on certain situation 2 Silver Blossom Ring can be equipped at a time is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Fox Spirits VI skill tooltip contains text error is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where equipments with fixed potential obtained from Events contains text error in item tooltip is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Vicious' Hammer cannot be use on equipments is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Suspicious Additional Cube UI's potential lines misaligned is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where an abnormal line of text appear on Character Deletion Wait Time is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Hyper Teleport Rock cannot be used if Premium Service Coupon is in the inventory is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where CHASER: FATE check list related to accumulated survival duration in Spirit Emotions cannot be completed is being investigated.
    •  ↪ Affected Maplers whom reached 3,000 weekly EXP coupons limit are required to complete Spirit Emotions once to reflect previously accumulated survival duration to the related check list(s).
  • [Resolved] An issue where if Collector's Request quest is completed prior to accepting CHASER event quest would resulted in related check list cannot be completed is being investigated.
    •  ↪ Related check list(s) can be completed if the character has previously completed Collector's Request quest.
  • [Resolved] An issue where CHASER: FATE 'Join 'Secret Record Recapture' 3/4 times' were abnormally completed is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where CHASER: FATE's check list related to Dimension Library Episodes cannot be completed is being investigated.
    •  ↪ Related check list(s) can be completed if the character has previously completed the relevant Dimension Library Episode.
  • [Resolved] An issue where Epic Dungeon Quick Pass hover tooltip contains text error is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where MapleM related contents are missing is being investigated.
    •  ↪ MapleM related content(s) now can be found in Event List.
  • [Resolved] An issue where [Chew Chew] Off the Waterfall quest cannot be proceed is being investigated.
    •  ↪ Affected Maplers may proceed with [Chew Chew] Off the Waterfall quest.
  • [Resolved] An issue where opening the Guild Bulletin will cause game client crash is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where using 'Regular' type cubes such as Suspicious Cube will cause the game client crash is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where a logging out reminder of "Sol Erda Booster - Daily Reward" is displayed even if you did not activate the Sol Erda Booster is being investigated.
  • [Resolved] An issue where certain achievement contains text error is being investigated.

    • By-Design Issues
  • [By-Design] An error where texts shown in Maple Auction's search input field are not centered is being investigated.
    •  ↪ The text position is intended to be bias towards the bottom of the input field.
  • [By-Design] An error where Aran/Eunwol Blooming Moon Secret Guide 'Defeat Monster Within the Level Range' counter does not work while in party is being investigated.
    •  ↪ The counter will only progress if the character is in a single character party or not in a party.

    - MapleSEA Administrator
     

    [Completed] Minor Patch and Cash Shop Update on 20th November 2024


    19 Nov 2024

    [Completed] Minor Patch and Cash Shop Update on 20th November 2024


    Event's Winner Reward Crediting
  • Event(s):
    •   ↪ Mysterious Lights of Diwali - click here for more details.
      ↪ Spooky Halloween Dress Up! SNS Event
  • How to Claim: Respective reward(s) can be claimed from the Reward Box on the left.
  • Claim Period: 20th November 2024, after maintenance until 3rd December 2024, 2359hrs.

    • Congratulations to the event winner(s)!



    Dear Maplers,

    Please be informed that there will be a scheduled maintenance on 20th November 2024.
    During this period, services that are undergoing maintenance will be temporarily unavailable.

    Game Maintenance
  • Maintenance Period: 20th November 2024, 0900hrs ~ 1300hrs 1228hrs (GMT +8)
  • Affected Service(s): MapleStorySEA Game Servers
  • Impact: All MapleStorySEA game servers will be unavailable.
    •   ↪ Game services for all worlds will not be available during the stipulated time. Kindly log out before this period to avoid disruptions to your gameplay.

    Minor Patch


  • Game Client Version: v237.3
  • Size: ~143 MB
  • A Minor Patch has been included in this maintenance.
  • You are recommended to launch your Game Client to run the Auto Patcher.

    • Updates
  • Cash Shop Update details for 20th November 2024 can be found here.
  • A Minor Patch will be included in this update.

    • Known Issues
  • List of known issues, issues scheduled to be fixed and fixed issues can be found here.

    • Thank you.

    - MapleSEA Administrator
     

    Special Sunday Maple (v237)


    20 Nov 2024

    Special Sunday Maple (v237)


    24 November 2024 - Hyper EXP Time v1
    1 December 2024 - Shining Star Force Time
    8 December 2024 - Extraordinary So(u)l Augmentation
    15 December 2024 - Hyper EXP Time v2



















    Note: To enjoy Sunday Maple Benefits, characters must be Level 101+. For the case of Zero characters, you must complete Chapter 2 Story Quest.
     

    国际服冒险岛公告


    v.255 - The Dark Ride: Ride or Die Patch Notes


    Get ready to Ride or Die in a brand-new Global MapleStory-exclusive experience where you'll test your skills and face off against familiar foes! Go Zero to One Hundred with revamped abilities for Aran and Shade in their epic redux. Level up your Legion with not one, but TWO Hyper Burning characters and Tera Blink your way to 10K! Journey through the Page of Memories to uncover stories from the past and earn awesome rewards.

    TABLE OF CONTENTS

    • New Updates
      • Aran Redux
      • Shade Redux
      • Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes
      • Level-up Flow Changes
      • Intense Power Crystal Revamp
      • Familiars: Hotel Arcus
      • Boss/Monster Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Monster Park Changes
      • NPC Changes and Bug Fixes
      • UI Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Maple Planner
      • V Matrix Improvements
      • Buff Display Settings System
      • Damage Skin UI Changes
      • Item Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Quest Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Map Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Guild Castle Revamp
      • Exceptional Enhancement Changes
      • Epic Dungeon Changes and Bug Fixes
      • Fog Forest Training Grounds Changes
      • Collector’s Request
    • The Dark Ride: Ride or Die Event
      • The Dark Ride: Ride or Die
    • Page of Memories Events
      • Page of Memories
      • Book of Unforgettable Festivals
      • Book of Forgotten Festivals
      • Azwan Shamaness Blessing
      • Von Leon’s Swordsmanship
      • Preserving Secret Records
      • Secret Record Training Center
      • Festival Record Training Center
      • Meso Shop
    • Burning Events
      • Item Burning
      • Zero to One Hundred
      • Hyper Burning
      • Blossoming by Moonshade Hyper Burning
      • Blossoming by Moonshade: Flower Scroll - Aran
      • Blossoming by Moonshade: Moon Scroll - Shade
      • Tera Blink
      • Burning World
      • Burning World Leap
    • Other Events
      • Sunny Sunday
      • Spell Trace Fever Time

    NEW UPDATES

    Aran Redux

    Aran's unlocked memories have uncovered a fantastical new set of techniques for her polearm to smash through her foes, along with a brand new story for the ancient, mighty warrior!

    Beginner Skill Changes

    • Regained Memory
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The movement speed boost has been removed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Combat Step
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The movement speed boost has been increased from 15 to 25.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Return to Rein
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Combo Kill Blessing
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Three Snails
      • Fixed the issue where the skill could not be used.

    1st Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Final Charge
      • A new skill that quickly moves your character forward while pushing nearby enemies in front of you.
      • You can use the skill by canceling it immediately while using Beyond Blade. In this case a 3-second cooldown is applied.
    • NEW Final Toss
      • A new skill that jumps by launching multiple enemies into the air.
    • NEW Ol’ Reliable
      • A new skill that builds up the foundation of a warrior and increases DEF, ATT, and Critical Rate by building up the foundation.
    • Smash Swing
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The master level has been increased from 10 to 15.
      • Smash Swing can now be used while in the air.
    • The following skills have been removed:
      • Smash Wave
      • Body Pressure

    2nd Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Combo Ability
      • A new skill that increases combos every 5 seconds. The number of combos acquired every 5 seconds increases from 10 to 20.
      • Based on the number of stacked Combo Count, it increases attack and movement speed.
      • Permanently increases Critical Rate and Stance.
    • NEW Beyond Blade
      • A new skill where Maha draws out the power of Aran and sweeps away enemies in front of you.
    • Drain
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Snow Charge
      • The damage boost at master level has been increased from 10% to 15%
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Polearm Mastery
      • The Final Damage has been increased from 8% to 10%.
    • Final Attack
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • The following skills have been removed:
      • Rolling Spin
      • Command Master I
      • Swing Studies I

    3rd Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Permafrost
      • With Maha’s power, summon a polearm containing icy energy to create a frozen ground for a certain period of time.
    • NEW Beyond Blade Mastery I
      • Further enhance Beyond Blade by drawing out Aran’s power with Maha.
    • NEW High Defense
      • Decrease damage taken and increase max HP, DEF, and Knockback Resistance.
    • Advanced Combo Ability
      • This skill applies the Combo Ability’s stack effect at the maximum value.
      • Decreased master level to 1 and the skill is automatically learned upon completing the 3rd Job Advancement.
      • The Critical Rate increase has been removed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Judgement Draw
      • The damage at master level has decreased from 380% to 200%.
      • The Command Activation effect and Damage over Time effect has been removed.
      • The up and down arrow keys + Attack Key command has been removed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Adrenaline Rush
      • A freezing shockwave that continuously attacks nearby enemies while the skill is active.
      • The feature that increases Aran’s attacking skill damage, other than Finisher, summons, additional attack skills, attack count, and max amount of enemies that can be hit during Adrenaline Rush has been removed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Adrenaline Rush Activate
      • The master level has been increased from 1 to 20 and the level skill is shared with Adrenaline Rush.
      • The duration for activating Adrenaline Rush has been removed.
      • When the duration of Adrenaline Rush ends, combos will reset to 0.
      • Added a feature that refunds combos based on the number of direct attack skill hits made while Adrenaline Rush is active, triggered when Adrenaline Rush ends.
      • The number of combos refunded after Adrenaline Rush at master level has been increased from 200 to 500.
      • A cooldown period has been added.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Might
      • The master level has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • Added a feature that increases Critical Rate and Boss Damage.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Maha’s Blessing
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • The following skills have been removed:
      • Aero Swing
      • Final Blow
      • Gathering Hook

    4th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Adrenaline Overload
      • Use the power of combos and Maha’s power to go beyond the limits of Adrenaline Rush.
      • The number of attacks required to enter the Adrenal Awakening state during Adrenaline Rush has been decreased from 15 to 10.
    • NEW Glacial Prison
      • Bind enemies by unleashing a great amount of cold energy that was concentrated onto a polearm.
    • NEW Beyond Blade Mastery II
      • Draw out more of Aran’s power with a more powerful resonation with Maha.
    • NEW Cleaving Attack
      • Increases Ignore Defense and damage with endless effort.
      • The Damage boost at master level has been increased from 30% to 35%.
    • Finisher - Hunter’s Prey
      • Removed the feature that increased damage while charging.
      • Removed the feature that triggered a charge toward the enemy upon casting.
      • Removed the feature that allowed control of the attack angle when using the up and down arrow keys.
      • Added a cooldown of 30 seconds.
      • The number of attacks has been increased from 7 to 15.
      • The damage at master level has been decreased from 1070% to 790%.
      • The max enemies hit at master level has been increased from 1 to 10.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • High Mastery
      • The Critical Damage boost at master level has been increased from 8% to 10%
      • The Final Damage boost at master level has been increased from 15% to 21%.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Sudden Strike
      • The master level has been decreased from 30 to 10.
      • The damage for Final Charge, Final Toss, and Judgement Draw at master level has been increased from 60% to 140%.
      • The damage for Smash Swing and Permafrost has been increased when Sudden Strike is used.
    • Advanced Final Attack
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 85% to 180%.
    • Finisher - Storm of Fear
      • The skill has been removed.

    Hyper Skill Changes

    • NEW Permafrost - Reinforce
      • Increases damage of Permafrost.
    • NEW Permafrost - Spread
      • Increases Max Enemies Hit of Permafrost.
    • NEW Permafrost - Persist
      • Increases the duration of Permafrost.
    • NEW Hyper Finisher - Last Stand
      • Unleashes a slash containing Maha’s power with a hero’s indomitable will.
    • NEW Finisher - Reinforce
      • Increases the damage of Finisher and Hyper Finisher.
    • NEW Finisher - Guardbreak
      • Increases the Ignore Enemy DEF stat for Finisher and Hyper Finisher.
    • NEW Maha’s Blessing
      • Negates an enemy’s attack using a powerful barrier, created by the Spirit of Polearm Maha.
    • Surging Adrenaline
      • The skill icon has been changed.
    • Beyond-er Blade
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Beyond Blade Barrage
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Piercing Beyond Blade
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Heroic Memories
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • The following skills have been removed:
      • Heavy Swing
      • Swing - Boss Rush
      • Rebounding Swing
      • Storming Terror
      • Merciless Hunt
      • Adrenaline Burst
      • Maha’s Domain

    5th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Final Beyond Blade - White Tiger
      • Complete the Beyond Blade by placing all of Maha’s power onto the Polearm.
    • NEW Finisher - Adrenaline Surge
      • Release an explosive burst of cold energy with Maha’s power creating a giant blizzard that attacks enemies.
    • Maha’s Carnage
      • The damage at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 1200% to 1100%.
      • The attack count has been decreased from 15 to 12.
      • The Slash count has been increased from 2 to 4.
      • When Adrenaline Rush or Adrenal Awakening is active, cooldown reduction will take into effect for Maha’s Carnage.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Blizzard Tempest
      • Stunning enemies while casting has been removed.
      • The number of enemies affected by Dire Wolf’s Curse has been decreased from 12 to 10 when casting.
      • The number of enemies affected by Dire Wolf’s Curse from the aura at set intervals has been decreased from 10 to 5.
      • The duration of Dire Wolf’s Curse has been increased from 10 to 15 seconds.
      • The maximum duration of Dire Wolf’s Curse has been increased from 20 to 30 seconds.
      • A feature has been added to Dire Wolf’s Curse that targets enemies with the highest HP
      • The damage for Dire Wolf’s Curse Ice Chunk at Lv. 25 has been increased from 950% to 1200%.
      • A cooldown of 0.4 seconds has been added to Ice Chunk.
      • Added a feature that increases the combo count when casting.
      • The cooldown has been decreased from 180 seconds to 90 seconds.
      • The casting skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Maha’s Fury
      • The skill has been removed.

    6th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Endgame
      • With a single strike, end a battle by completely unleashing all of Maha’s power.
    • HEXA Beyond Blade
      • The damage of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit at master level has been increased from 525% to 675%.
      • The additional hit damage at master level has been increased from 600% to 630%.
      • The feature that decreased the cooldown of the additional attack while Adrenaline Rush was active has been removed.
      • The feature that increased Normal Enemy Damage has been removed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • HEXA Finisher - Hunter’s Prey
      • Create a single powerful attack by collecting power in a polearm.
    • Fenrir Crash Boost
      • The skill has been removed.
      • Changed to Final Beyond Blade - White Tiger.
    • Maha’s Fury Boost
      • The skill has been removed.
      • Changed to Finisher - Adrenaline Surge Boost.

    Node Changes

    • Boost Nodes that previously contained the Smash Wave, Rolling Spin, or Gathering Hook skills will now be replaced with the following skills:
      • 1st priority: Beyond Blade
      • 2nd priority: Hyper Finisher - Last Stand
      • 3rd priority: Finisher - Hunter’s Prey
      • Note: Nodes that already include the replaced skill will be updated with a comparable skill.
    • The following Nodes have been removed:
      • Smash Wave
      • Rolling Spin
      • Gathering Hook Node

    Quest Changes

    • A new Aran story has been added.
    • Aran’s quest content has been updated.
    • Previous Aran quests have been removed and can no longer be completed.
    • The completion requirement for the ‘Complete Aran Story Quest’ Legion Artifact Special Mission has been changed from ‘Complete [Neinheart’s Thanks]’ to ‘Complete [Commander of the Past]’.
    • The requirements for the ‘Aran’s Journal’ Achievement has been changed.
    • The following maps have been adjusted to fit the recommended resolution:
      • Lilin’s Home
      • Rein Library 1st, 2nd, and 3rd Floor
      • Mirror Cave
    • Aran players who haven’t completed their 1st Job Advancement before the redux can now advance through the ‘Lilin’s Guidance’ quest.

    Back to Top

    Shade Redux

    Shade's union with the spirits has reached a new level, with brand new ways for the pirate hero to call upon his allies! Shade has new secondary weapons, a new story to enjoy, and a whole lot more!

    Common

    • The classification label for Secondary Weapons has been changed.
    • The equipment level restriction for Blue Fox Marble has been changed to Lv. 10.
    • A new Shade story has been added.
    • Shade’s quest content has been updated.
    • Previous Shade quests have been removed and can no longer be completed.
    • The following Shade items have been added and changed:
      • Medal: Stranger
      • Medal: Beyond Memory
      • Medal: Fox’s Best Friend
      • Medal: Honorary Fox
        • The equipment level restriction has been changed from Lv. 27 to Lv. 30.
      • Equipment: Blue Fox Marble
        • The equipment level restriction has been changed from Lv. 20 to Lv. 10.
    • The Miscellaneous item, Glass Bottle, will no longer be dropped.
    • The completion requirement for the ‘Complete Shade Story Quest’ Legion Artifact Special Mission has been changed from ‘Complete [Mutual Longing]’ to ‘Complete [Gift of the Fox God]’.
    • The requirements for ‘Shade’s Journal’ has been updated.

    Beginner Skill Changes

    • NEW Yearning Heart
      • A new skill that summons spirit guardians with the blessing of the Fox God.
    • Fox Trot
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Bond 1
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Affinity
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Close Call
      • The skill effect has been changed.

    1st Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Fox God’s Favor
      • A new skill that increases Attack Speed for a set duration, granted by the blessing of the Fox God.
    • Swift Strike
      • The master level has been decreased from 25 to 20.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • Flash Fist
      • The master level has been decreased from 25 to 20.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • Vulpes Leap
      • The master level has been decreased from 20 to 10.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.

    2nd Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Foxy Courage
      • A new skill that boosts your battle prowess by channeling the power of the Fox God.
    • NEW Blade Imp - Direction
      • A new skill that lets the player choose the direction of Blade Imp by summoning a blade spirit.
    • NEW Blade Imp - Spin Slash
      • A new skill that pulls nearby enemies toward you by summoning a blade spirit.
    • Blade Imp - Forward Slash
      • The skill is now usable while in the air.
      • The master level has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • The duration of Blade Imp - Trap has been increased from 60 seconds to 120 seconds.
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 110% to 155%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Blade Imp - Downward Slash
      • The skill is now usable while in the air.
      • The duration of Blade Imp - Trap has been increased from 60 seconds to 120 seconds.
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 100% to 155%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
      • Fixed the issue where the hotkey effect did not display when the cooldown reset.
    • Ground Pound
      • The Shockwave feature has been removed.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Fox Spirits
      • The master level has been increased from 1 to 10.
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 80% to 120%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Back Step
      • The master level has been decreased from 15 to 10.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Bond 2
      • The Speed at master level has been increased from 20 to 22.
      • A feature that increases maximum Speed has been added.
      • The master level has been decreased from 10 to 4.
    • Fox Spirit Mastery
      • The skill has been removed.

    3rd Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Total Unity
      • A new skill that increases ATT, DEF, and Critical Damage by uniting with the spirit.
    • Shockwave Punch
      • The damage of 1st hit at master level has been increased from 310% to 350%.
      • The attack count of the 1st hit has been increased from 3 times to 4 times.
      • The damage of 2nd hit at master level has been increased from 330% to 396%.
      • The attack count of 2nd hit at master level has been increased from 3 times to 4 times.
      • The feature that triggers a Shockwave has been removed.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Frenzy
      • Changed to a skill that creates veils, opening a pathway for spirits to walk through.
    • Spirit Trap
      • The cooldown has been decreased from 210 seconds to 120 seconds.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Redemption
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Bond 3
      • A feature that increases Final Damage and Boss Damage has been added.
      • The feature that increases Damage and ATT has been removed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Weaken
      • The duration of the weakening spirit possession has been increased from 15 seconds to 30 seconds.
      • A feature that increases Ignore Defense has been added.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Blade Imp - Spin Slash
      • The skill has been removed.

    4th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Heartfelt Communion
      • A new skill that increases the impact of Fox Spirits and Spirit Frenzy by calling upon more powerful spirits.
    • Bomb Punch
      • The damage of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit at master level has been decreased from 300% to 225%.
      • The attack count of the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd hit has been increased from 3 times to 4 times.
      • The Normal Enemy Damage at master level has been decreased from 255%p to 192%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Claw
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Death Mark
      • The damage at master level has been decreased from 700% to 600%.
      • The attack count has been increased from 3 times to 8 times.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Soul Splitter
      • A skill that creates a soul-burning flame by splitting the enemy’s soul with a flame spirit.
      • While under the Fire Spirit’s Blessing, the Final Damage increase for party members has been reduced to 15% when attacking an enemy with Soul Splitter debuff.
      • The cooldown at master level has been reduced from 180 seconds to 60 seconds.
        • Party members affected by Soul Splitter cannot receive the same effect for a set duration.
      • The Soul Splitter resistance time has been decreased from 90 seconds to 50 seconds.
      • A resistance icon now displays at the bottom of the HP bar when an enemy is resisting Soul Splitter.
      • A resistance debuff effect has been added to show when an enemy is resisting Soul Splitter.
      • This skill is no longer affected by cooldown reset effects.
    • Spirit Ward
      • This skill no longer consumes a guardian spirit upon colliding with an enemy.
      • A feature that re-casts Spirit Ward at set intervals when the guardian spirit isn’t maxed out has been added.
    • Critical Insight
      • The Critical Rate at master level has been decreased from 25% to 10%.
      • The Critical Damage at master level has been increased from 10% to 18%.
    • Spirit Bond 4
      • The Final Damage increase has been removed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Advanced Knuckle Mastery
      • The Critical Damage increase has been removed.
    • Fire Fox Spirit Mastery
      • The skill has been removed.

    Hyper Skill Changes

    • NEW Fox Marble Fusion
      • A new skill that unleashes the power of the Fox God from the Fox Marble has been added.
      • The Fox Spirits Orb damage at master level has been increased from 110% to 140%.
    • Fire Fox Spirits - Reinforce
      • The skill name has been changed to Fox Spirits - Reinforce
    • Fire Fox Spirits - Repeated Attack Bonus
      • The skill name has been changed to Fox Spirits - Repeated Attack Bonus.
    • Fire Fox Spirits - Summon Chance
      • The skill name has been changed to Fox Spirits - Summon Chance.
    • Spirit Incarnation
      • A feature that decreases the cooldown based on the remaining key down time at the end of the skill has been added.
      • The damage has been decreased from 700% to 100%.
      • The attack count has been increased from 1 times to 7 times.
    • Heroic Memories
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • Spirit Bond Max
      • The skill has been removed.

    5th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW Fox God Flash
      • A new skill that releases a bright light cutting through darkness by manifesting as an avatar of the Fox God has been added.
      • The skill can be used while in the air.
    • Spiritgate
      • Changed to a skill that opens the spirit gate, allowing dark spirits to attack the enemy with a powerful release of energy.
    • True Spirit Claw
      • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 690% to 800%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effect has been changed.
    • Smashing Multipunch
      • The max key down time has been increased from 1.3 seconds to 1.8 seconds.
      • The attack count has been increased from 5 to 10.
      • The final attack activation count has been increased from 3 times to 8 times.
      • The Fox Spirit creation chance upon landing an attack has been decreased from 100% to 50%.
      • The feature that summons additional Fox Spirits upon landing the final attack has been removed.
      • The damage at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 500% to 410%.
      • The Shockwave damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 700% to 800%.
      • The skill icon has been changed.
      • The skill effects have been changed.
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Spirit Flow
      • The skill has been removed.

    6th Job Skill Changes

    • NEW HEXA Fox Spirits
      • A new skill that enhances Fox Spirits.
      • The damage at master level has been increased from 235% to 352%.
      • The damage increase of Fox Marble Fusion at master level has been increased from 85% to 93%.
    • NEW Advent of the Fox
      • A new skill that awakens all of Shade's dormant spiritual power through the resonance with the Fox God.
    • NEW HEXA Spirit Claw
      • A new skill that summons a wind spirit to claw at multiple enemies.
    • Spirit Flow Boost
      • The skill name has been changed to Fox God Flash Boost.
    • HEXA Spirit Frenzy
      • The skill has been removed.

    Node Changes

    • Boost Nodes that previously contained the Blade Imp - Downward Slash or Blade Imp - Spin Slash skill will now be replaced with the following skills:
      • 1st priority: Blade Imp
      • 2nd priority: Spirit Claw
      • 3rd priority: Fox Spirits
      • Note: Nodes that already include the replaced skill will be updated with a comparable skill.
    • Blade Imp - Forward Slash
      • The Node name has been changed to Blade Imp Node.
    • The following Nodes have been removed:
      • Blade Imp - Downward Slash
      • Blade Imp - Spin Slash Node

    Back to Top

    Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes

    Shade and Aran aren't the only ones being improved with The Dark Ride update. Look over the truly massive list of changes, improvements, and fixes for all of MapleStory's classes below!

    Common Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • Detailed stats will now display when hovering the mouse cursor over the gauge UI for the following jobs:
      • Luminous
      • Kaiser
      • Ark
    • Changed the cooldown for Hero’s Echo, Exclusive Spell, and Focused Time to 300 seconds.
    • Changed the Holy Fountain buff icon activated by Unreliable Memory to differentiate it from Bishop’s Holy Fountain buff icon.
    • Changed the following skills acquired through Nodestones to be a passive effect:
      • Decent Speed Infusion
      • Decent Advanced Blessing
    • Changed the following stat increase effects skills to be a passive effect:
      • Maple Warrior
      • Call of Cygnus
      • Rhinne’s Protection
      • President’s Orders
      • Nova Warrior
      • Hero of the Flora
      • Anima Warrior
      • Akatsuki Warrior
    • Removed the preparation time for Goddess’s Blessing and a cooldown has been added for the following skills:
      • Maple World Goddess’s Blessing
      • Empress Cygnus’s Blessing
      • Transcendent Cygnus’s Blessing
      • Transcendent Rhinne’s Prayer
      • Grandis Goddess’s Blessing
      • Otherworld Goddess’s Blessing
      • Princess Sakuno’s Blessing
    • Decent Advanced Blessing
      • Added a feature that permanently increases all stats.
    • Empress Cygnus’s Blessing
      • Fixed the issue where the damage increase from Cygnus Blessing exceeded the maximum damage.
    • Otherworld Goddess’s Blessing
      • When the blessing is active, the Otherworldly Void attack will trigger at least 3 times during its duration.
    • Transcendent Rhinne’s Prayer
      • Fixed the issue where the duration of the Immune Barrier was not set to the maximum duration upon activation.
    • Conversion Overdrive
      • Removed the preparation time.
    • Divine Wrath
      • The skill description has been changed.
    • Added the ability to toggle the effect on/off for the following skills:
      • Mana Overload
      • Bleed Dart
      • Blood Money
      • Blade Clone
      • Equinox Cycle
      • Dark Metamorphosis - Enhance
      • Blue Blood
    • Weapon Aura
      • The attack range has been changed to increase vertically.
    • Last Resort
      • The damage taken increase at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 40% to 30%.
      • The final damage increase at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 35% to 29%.
    • Decent Mystic Door
      • Magic Rock will no longer be consumed when cast.
    • Decent Holy Fountain
      • A new Node that summons a holy fountain to restore party members HP with holy power.
    • Venom Burst
      • Fixed the issue where the original DoT damage spread to monsters that could not be hit.
    • Fixed the issue of delayed changes when adjusting settings for skills with special modes or locked commands.
    • Fixed the issue where the “You cannot use that skill yet” pop-up would appear when trying to use the Noblesse Skill again without having mesos.
    • Fixed the issue where the Goddess of the Other World’s Blessing’s Otherworldly Void was sometimes activated abnormally.
    • Fixed the issue where the icon looked awkward when hovering the mouse over the Butterfly Garden Light Lv.3 Skill in the Lil Glowy Butterfly Set.
    • Fixed the issue where the direction sometimes would not change when casting Erda Spectrum: Erda Release.
    • Fixed the issue where the cooldown reduction effect of the following Special Nodes was applied to certain Hyper Skills:
      • Come Back I
      • Come Back II
      • Relentless Attack
      • Withstand II
    • Fixed the issue where Sol Janus was affected by the cooldown reset effect.
    • Fixed the issue where the following skills appeared in awkward locations:
    Job Skill Image
    Bishop Holy Advent
    Kaiser Nova Guardians
    Bladefall
    Kain Lasting Grudge
    • Fixed the awkward display of the effect in the zoomed-out map when the following skills were used:
    Job Skill Image
    Bishop Holy Advent
    Pathfinder Forsaken Relic
    Demon Slayer Nightmare
    • Fixed the issue where Sol Janus: Dawn activated when the following skills were used:
    Job Skill Image
    Bowman (all) Guided Arrow

    Arch Mage (Fire, Poison) Ignite

    • Fixed the issue where Sol Janus: Dusk activated when the following skills were used:
    Job Skill Image
    Arch Mage (Fire, Poison) Ifrit

    Job Skill Improvements and Bug Fixes

    • Angelic Buster
      • Mighty Mascot
        • Fixed the issue where the explosion damage of Mighty Mascot was not enhanced by the HEXA Boost Node.
        • The damage over time at Lv. 30 has been decreased from 1540% to 1265%.
        • The explosion damage at Lv. 30 has been decreased from 1815% to 1485%.
    • Xenon
      • Hero’s Echo
        • Fixed the issue where MP was not consumed when using Hero’s Echo.
    • Demon Avenger
      • Requiem
        • Fixed the issue where the use duration was not displayed.
      • Demon Sword Roar
        • Fixed the issue where the activation duration was not displayed.
    • Hero
      • Upward Charge
        • The action delay has been reduced by approximately 35%.
      • Warrior Mastery
        • The speed increase at master level has been increased from 10 to 22.
        • The maximum speed has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • Rising Rage
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 500% to 560%.
      • Cry Valhalla
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 370% to 520%.
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 13%.
      • Burning Soul Blade
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 7%.
      • Instinctual Combo
        • The Tear in Space damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 325% to 365%.
      • Sword Illusion
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 10%.
      • HEXA Rising Rage
        • The damage at master level has been increased by 254% to 270%.
    • Paladin
      • Hammers of the Righteous
        • Fixed the issue where Hammers of the Righteous would attack an orb during Erda Spectrum Stage 1.
      • Upward Charge
        • The action delay has decreased by approximately 35%.
      • Warrior Mastery
        • The speed at master level has been increased from 10 to 22.
        • The maximum speed has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • Divine Shield
        • Fixed the issue where the toggle to turn the effect on/off was sometimes not applied in the village.
      • Blast
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 305% to 340%.
      • Divine Judgement
        • The damage of Divine Brand at master level has been increased from 550% to 700%.
      • Smite Shield
        • The skill is now usable while in the air.
      • Divine Echo
        • The final damage increase at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 20% to 13% when using Divine Blessing on an echoed player.
      • Grand Guardian
        • The feature that fixes speed when using the skill has been removed.
        • The max key-down duration has been decreased from 6 seconds to 4 seconds.
        • The damage before the cross gets bigger at Lv. 25 has been increased from 595% to 700%.
        • The damage after the cross gets bigger at Lv. 25 has been increased from 1040% to 1410%.
        • The attack interval before the cross gets bigger has been decreased by approximately 16%.
        • The attack interval after the cross gets bigger has been decreased by approximately 33%.
      • Mighty Mjolnir
        • The ability to summon all Hammers of the Ancient God by using the attack key has been added.
        • The damage of the first attack at Lv. 25 has been increased from 400% to 485%.
        • The shockwave damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 450% to 550%.
      • HEXA Blast
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 465% to 535%.
      • HEXA Divine Judgement
        • The damage of Divine Brand at master level has been increased from 890% to 1160%.
      • Falling Justice
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 1300% to 1560%.
    • Dark Knight
      • Upward Charge
        • The action delay has been decreased by approximately 35%.
      • Warrior Mastery
        • The speed at master level has been increased from 10 to 22.
        • The maximum speed at master level has been increased from 10 to 20.
      • Nightshade Explosion
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 330% to 400%.
        • A feature has been added that allows you to use Speak of Darkness without the casting animation.
      • Revenge of the Evil Eye
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 255% to 309%.
        • The attack count has been increased from 5 times to 7 times.
      • Evil Eye Shock III
        • The damage upon casting at master level has been increased from 370% to 630%.
        • The number of attacks upon casting has been increased from 6 to 7.
        • The damage of auras of darkness at master level has been increased from 350% to 423%.
        • The number of attacks of auras of darkness has been increased from 3 to 5.
      • Darkness Aura
        • The buff will now remain active if the skill is reused and dark slash is activated.
        • The max life force has been decreased from 15 to 10.
        • The amount of life force required for each additional dark slash has been reduced from 3 to 1.
        • The damage of dark slash at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 1325% to 1225%.
        • Upon casting Dead Space, you immediately gain maximum Life Force from Darkness Aura.
      • Spear of Darkness
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 650% to 795%.
        • A limit on the maximum number of attacks that can be made on a single enemy has been added.
      • Calamitous Cyclone
        • The maximum keydown duration has been decreased from 4.5 seconds to 4 seconds.
        • When an abnormal status is applied while the key is held down, the finishing attack is triggered immediately.
        • The continuous damage at Lv. 25 while holding down the key has been decreased from 945% to 730%.
        • The number of continuous attacks while holding down the key has been decreased from 12 to 8.
        • A limit on the number of times a keydown continuous attack can be activated has been added.
        • The damage of the finishing attack at Lv. 25 has been increased from 710% to 1545%.
        • The finishing attack activation count has been increased from 5 to 8.
      • HEXA Nightshade Explosion
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 580% to 750%.
    • Arch Mage (Fire, Poison)
      • HEXA Flame Haze
        • The skill description has been changed.
      • Teleport
        • A feature that permanently increases speed and maximum speed has been added.
      • Teleport Mastery
        • The damage duration at master level has been increased from 4 seconds to 20 seconds.
      • Fixed the issue where Poison Mist damage-over-time created by HEXA Flame Haze was not enhanced when the HEXA Flame Haze or HEXA Mist Eruption nodes were boosted.
    • Arch Mage (Ice, Lightning)
      • Teleport
        • A feature that permanently increases speed and maximum speed has been added.
      • Freezing Breath
        • The maximum keydown duration at master level has been decreased from 13 seconds to 10 seconds.
        • The cooldown has been decreased from 180 seconds to 120 seconds.
      • Elquine
        • The skill description has been changed.
      • Lightning Orb
        • The maximum keydown duration has been decreased from 3.6 seconds to 2 seconds.
        • The skill end action delay has been decreased by approximately 44%.
        • The attack interval has been decreased by approximately 42%.
      • Spirit of Snow
        • The number of attacks has been increased from 9 to 10.
      • Jupiter Thunder
        • The shock damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 600% to 800%.
        • The current damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 400% to 520%.
    • Bishop
      • The following debuff skills have been removed:
        • Angel Ray
        • HEXA Angel Ray
        • Bahamut
        • Divine Punishment
      • The following skills will no longer be affected by the increased INT from the special skill ring:
        • Benediction
        • Blood of the Divine
        • Resurrection
        • Angel of Balance
      • Teleport
        • A feature that permanently increases speed and maximum speed has been added.
      • Spell Mastery
        • The skill description has been changed.
      • Holy Fountain
        • The skill cannot be used on maps where a party member’s Holy Fountain, Decent Holy Fountain, or Decent Holy Fountain’s Traces of the Holy are active.
        • Fixed the issue where the buff icon disappears when a player dies.
        • Fixed the issue where the buff icon of a previously summoned Holy Fountain did not disappear when using Holy Fountain with Unreliable Memory while another Holy Fountain was summoned.
      • Blood of the Divine
        • The cooldown has been decreased from 240 seconds to 120 seconds.
        • The feature that reduced cooldown time based on INT has been removed.
      • Buff Mastery
        • A feature that permanently increases Final Damage has been added.
      • Angel of Balance
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 485% to 650%.
        • The preparation time for Holy Light has been increased from 8.5 seconds to 11 seconds.
        • The limit on possession of Holy Light has been decreased from 8 to 5.
      • Benediction
        • A feature that reduces the Final Damage increase applied to party members in proportion to the number of party members has been added.
        • The INT standard for increasing Final Damage has been increased from 2500 to 3000.
        • The Final Damage increase based on INT at Lv. 25 has been decreased from a maximum of 40% to 30%.
        • The duration at Lv. 25 has been increased from 42 seconds to 57 seconds.
        • The duration reduction when the skill is reused within 5 seconds at Lv. 25 has been increased from 14 seconds to 19 seconds.
        • The HEXA Boost Node Final Damage at master level has been increased from 10% to 17%.
    • Bow Master
      • Quiver cartridges can now be used alongside the following skills:
        • Hurricane
        • HEXA Hurricane
        • HEXA Hurricane: Shootout Mode
      • Enchanted Quiver
        • The probability of creating a Blood Arrow at master level has been decreased from 70% to 60%.
        • The maximum HP recovery amount of Blood arrow has been decreased from 5% to 1.8%.
      • Armor Break
        • A feature that permanently increases Final Damage has been added.
      • Quiver Barrage
        • A feature that increases the Final Damage while the skill is active has been added.
      • HEXA Arrow Stream
        • Fixed an issue where the number of attack hits of Mortal blow did not increase.
      • HEXA Arrow Blaster
        • Fixed the issue where the number of Mortal Blows did not increase when skills were used.
    • Marksman
      • Split Shot
        • The skill description has been changed
      • Greater Empowered Arrows
        • The Marked Target duration has been increased from 15 seconds to 30 seconds.
        • The Marked Target now stays active even when a player dies.
      • Perfect Shot
        • The damage has been increased at Lv. 25 from 1700% to 1900%.
        • The duration of Marked Target applied upon hit has been decreased from 15 seconds to 30 seconds.
      • Split Shot
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 1200% to 1400%.
      • Surge Bolt
        • The damage before concentration is completed at Lv. 25 has been increased from 1000% to 1150%.
        • The damage after concentration is completed at Lv. 25 has been increased from 1500% to 1700%.
        • The number of attacks has been increased from 10 to 12.
        • The hit activation count has been increased from 1 to 2.
        • The cooldown has been increased from 10 seconds to 20 seconds.
        • Fixed the issue where the hit effect displayed awkwardly.
      • Repeating Crossbow Cartridge
        • The damage of Full Burst Shot at Lv. 25 has been increased from 750% to 1000%.
      • HEXA Snipe
        • The damage at master level has been increased from 545% to 670%.
      • HEXA Empowered Snipe
        • The damage upon casting at master level has been increased from 605% to 635%.
        • The additional hit damage at master level has been increased from 380% to 410%.
      • HEXA Ultimate Snipe
        • The damage upon casting at master level has been increased from 315% to 345%.
        • The additional hit damage at master level has been increased from 380% to 410%.
      • HEXA Piercing Arrow
        • The HEXA Snipe damage at master level has been increased from 60% to 90%.
        • The HEXA Empowered Snipe damage at master level has been increased from 120% to 150%.
    • Pathfinder
      • Curseweaver
        • The critical damage increase per stack of the Ancient Curse debuff has been decreased from 4% to 2%.
      • Ancient Bow Expertise
        • A feature that permanently increases Final Damage has been added.
        • The feature that permanently increased Critical Damage has been removed.
      • Obsidian Barrier
        • The number of attacks has been increased from 4 to 5.
      • Obsidian Barrier (Burst)
        • The number of attacks has been increased from 4 to 5.
      • Obsidian Barrier (Torrent)
        • The number of attacks has been increased from 4 to 5.
      • Relic Unbound (Deluge)
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 1000% to 1500%.
      • Relic Unbound (Burst)
        • The number of explosions have been increased from 4 to 6.
      • Relic Unbound (Torrent)
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been increased from 1400% to 1500%.
        • The attack count has been increased from 5 times to 7 times.
    • Night Lord
      • Shadow Leap
        • The height when used in the air at master level has been increased by approximately 11%.
      • Dark Harmony
        • The final damage increase at master level has been increased from 8% to 14%.
      • Shurrikane
        • The damage at Lv. 25 has been decreased from 600% to 560%.
        • The attack count has been increased from 5 times to 7 times.
      • Dark Lord’s Omen
        • Fixed the issue where the hit effect and sound effect were not output to other players if the scroll explosion did not hit an enemy.
        • The damage of throwing stars at Lv. 25 has been increased from 850% to 1245%.
        • The number of throwing stars per enemy has been increased from 5 to 6.
        • The damage of scroll explosion at Lv. 25 has been increased from 2150% to 3120%.
        • The number of attacks from scroll explosion has been increased from 10 to 12.
        • The cooldown has been increased from 60 seconds to 90 seconds.
    • Shadower
      • Dagger Mastery
        • A feature that increases Final Damage has been added.
      • Sonic Blow
        • The action delay upon casting has been decreased by 50%.
